summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 WABASH NATIONAL VAN. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE HAD AN ALIGNMENT FAILURE. WHILE DRIVING AND PULLING A TRAILER, THE VEHICLE WOULD GO SIX INCHES OVER TO THE RIGHT OF THE WHITE LINE ON THE ROAD. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO TEC EQUIPMENT STOCKTON (LOCATED AT 2050 E LOUISE AVE, LATHROP, CA 95330, (209) 858-4110) WHERE A WHEEL ALIGNMENT WAS COMPLETED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE ALIGNMENT DID NOT CORRECT THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 60,000.
